sentences.en: a discourse on issues of gender and sexuality
sentences.cn: 关于性别和性行为的论文

sentences.en: a science fiction story dealing with gender issues
sentences.cn: 以性别问题为题材的科幻故事

sentences.en: Dara challenges our stereotypical ideas about gender and femininity.
sentences.cn: 达拉对我们老一套的性别和女性特质观念提出了异议。

sentences.en: Discrimination on grounds of race or gender is forbidden.
sentences.cn: 严禁种族歧视和性别歧视。

sentences.en: French differs from English in having gender for all nouns.
sentences.cn: 法语不同于英语,所有的名词都有性.

sentences.en: In both Welsh and Irish the word for "moon" is of feminine gender.
sentences.cn: 在威尔士语和爱尔兰语中，表示“月亮”的词是阴性的。

sentences.en: Increased recruitment of women engineers will help correct the gender imbalance in the profession.
sentences.cn: 多聘请女工程师有助于平衡这一职业中存在的性别失衡.

sentences.en: issues of class, race and gender
sentences.cn: 阶级、种族和性别问题

sentences.en: Latin nouns have case, number and gender.
sentences.cn: 拉丁语名词有格 、 数和性.

sentences.en: Many factors are important, for example class, gender, age and ethnicity.
sentences.cn: 许多因素都很重要，如阶级、性别、年龄及民族。

sentences.en: Modern medical technology like type-B ultrasonic checks can reveal the fetus gender.
sentences.cn: 现在的医疗仪器例如B超是可以分辨出胎儿的性别的。

sentences.en: people of the same gender
sentences.cn: 同性别的人

sentences.en: She examines the interplay between changing gender divisions and urban change.
sentences.cn: 她研究性别差异的变化和城市变化之间的相互影响.

sentences.en: She modestly suggests that "sex, or at any rate gender, may account for the difference"
sentences.cn: 她谨慎地提出“性别，至少是男女的性征，也许能解释这个差异”。

sentences.en: The report was redrafted to remove gender-specific language.
sentences.cn: 重新起草这个报告，删除带有性别特点的语言。

sentences.en: The same kind of considerations hold for sex and gender.
sentences.cn: 上述情况同样适用于性别和名词的性.

sentences.en: There may be gender differences in attitudes to paid work.
sentences.cn: 对待有偿劳动的态度可能存在着性别差异。

sentences.en: toys that do not reinforce gender stereotypes
sentences.cn: 不强化性别模式化观念的玩具

sentences.en: traditional gender roles
sentences.cn: 传统的性别角色

sentences.en: While her observations may be true about some men, they could hardly apply to the entire gender.
sentences.cn: 虽然她的评论就某些男人而言可能是正确的，但绝不适用于所有男性。

sentences.en: Women are sometimes denied opportunities solely because of their gender.
sentences.cn: 妇女有时仅仅因为性别而无法获得种种机会。

phrases.tran_cn: 性別平等；男女平等；两性公平
性别认同；性别认定；性（别）身份

trans.tran_cn: <语>性某些语言的（阳性、阴性和中性，不同的性有不同的词尾等），性别，某些语言的（名词、代词和形容词）性的区分
trans.tran_en: the fact of being male or female

trans.tran_cn: 生（过去式gendered，过去分词gendered，现在分词gendering，第三人称单数genders，形容词genderless）
